verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w meekness|strong="G4236"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gentleness|strong="G1932"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w presence|strong="G4383"\w* \add am\add* \w base|strong="G5011"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* being \w absent|strong="G0548"\w* am \w bold|strong="G2292"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G1189"\w* \add you\add*, that I \w may|strong="G2292"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w bold|strong="G2292"\w* when I am \w present|strong="G3918"\w* with that \w confidence|strong="G4006"\w*, wherewith I \w think|strong="G3049"\w* to be \w bold|strong="G5111"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w think|strong="G3049"\w* of \w us|strong="G2248"\w* as \w if|strong="G5613"\w* we \w walked|strong="G4043"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* though we \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, we \w do|strong="G4754"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w war|strong="G4754"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*:

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w weapons|strong="G3696"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w warfare|strong="G4752"\w* \add are\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w carnal|strong="G4559"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1415"\w* through \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the pulling \w down|strong="G2506"\w* of strong \w holds|strong="G3794"\w*;)

Casting \w down|strong="G2507"\w* \w imaginations|strong="G3053"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* high \w thing|strong="G5313"\w* that exalteth \w itself|strong="G1869"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bringing into \w captivity|strong="G0163"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w thought|strong="G3540"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w readiness|strong="G2092"\w* to \w revenge|strong="G1556"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w disobedience|strong="G3876"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w obedience|strong="G5218"\w* is \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*.

Do ye \w look|strong="G0991"\w* on \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the outward \w appearance|strong="G4383"\w*? \w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w trust|strong="G3982"\w* to \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* that he \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*, let \w him|strong="G3049"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w think|strong="G3049"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \add is\add* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \add are\add* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* I should \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w somewhat|strong="G5100"\w* \w more|strong="G4053"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w edification|strong="G3619"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w destruction|strong="G2506"\w*, I \w should|strong="G0153"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="G0153"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* I \w may|strong="G1380"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seem|strong="G1380"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G0302"\w* I would \w terrify|strong="G1629"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w letters|strong="G1992"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \add his\add* \w letters|strong="G1992"\w*, say \w they|strong="G5346"\w*, \add are\add* \w weighty|strong="G0926"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w powerful|strong="G2478"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \add his\add* \w bodily|strong="G4983"\w* \w presence|strong="G3952"\w* \add is\add* \w weak|strong="G0772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add his\add* \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \w contemptible|strong="G1848"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G3049"\w* such an \w one|strong="G5108"\w* \w think|strong="G3049"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, such \w as|strong="G3634"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* in \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w letters|strong="G1992"\w* when we are \w absent|strong="G0548"\w*, \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \add will we be\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* in \w deed|strong="G2041"\w* when we are \w present|strong="G3918"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w dare|strong="G5111"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* make ourselves of the \w number|strong="G1469"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w compare|strong="G4793"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* with \w some|strong="G5100"\w* that \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w measuring|strong="G3354"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comparing|strong="G4793"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* among \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w are|strong="G4920"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w wise|strong="G4920"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G2744"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G1519"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G0280"\w* \add our\add* \w measure|strong="G0280"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* of the \w rule|strong="G2583"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w distributed|strong="G3307"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, a \w measure|strong="G3358"\w* to \w reach|strong="G2185"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w stretch|strong="G5239"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w beyond|strong="G5239"\w* \add our measure\add*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* we \w reached|strong="G2185"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we are \w come|strong="G5348"\w* as far \w as|strong="G0891"\w* to \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add preaching\add* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w boasting|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G1519"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G0280"\w* \add our\add* \w measure|strong="G0280"\w*, \add that is\add*, \w of|strong="G1722"\w* other \w men’s|strong="G0245"\w* \w labours|strong="G2873"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, when \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* is \w increased|strong="G0837"\w*, that we shall be \w enlarged|strong="G3170"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w rule|strong="G2583"\w* \w abundantly|strong="G4050"\w*,

To preach the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G5238"\w* \add regions\add* \w beyond|strong="G5238"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \add and\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* another \w man’s|strong="G0245"\w* line of \w things|strong="G2583"\w* made \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* our \w hand|strong="G2092"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w glorieth|strong="G2744"\w*, let him \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* he \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w commendeth|strong="G4921"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w approved|strong="G1384"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w commendeth|strong="G4921"\w*.
